errors.message: OpenRouter API key is required but not configured
errors.guidance: Get your API key from https://openrouter.ai/keys and add it to your .env file. OpenRouter provides access to multiple AI models with pay-per-use pricing.

errors.message: YouTube API key is required when YouTube ingestor is enabled
errors.guidance:
Get a YouTube Data API v3 key from Google Cloud Console:
1. Go to https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/library/youtube.googleapis.com
2. Enable the YouTube Data API v3
3. Create credentials (API key)
4. Add the key to your .env file
Alternatively, disable YouTube ingestor by setting YOUTUBE_INGESTOR_ENABLED=false

errors.message: Instapaper credentials are incomplete
errors.guidance: Both INSTAPAPER_LOGIN and INSTAPAPER_PASSWORD are required when Instapaper ingestor is enabled. Use your Instapaper account email and password, or disable the ingestor by setting INSTAPAPER_INGESTOR_ENABLED=false

warnings.message: 12ft.io fallback is enabled - potential privacy concern
warnings.guidance: The 12ft.io service sends URLs to a third-party service to bypass paywalls. This may expose your reading habits. Consider disabling if privacy is a concern.

warnings.message: YouTube ingestor enabled but no API key provided
warnings.guidance: YouTube ingestor requires YOUTUBE_API_KEY to function. Either provide the key or disable the ingestor.

warnings.message: Required command 'yt-dlp' not found in PATH
warnings.guidance: The yt-dlp command is required for audio/video processing. Install it using your system package manager.
warnings.fix_command: # Install yt-dlp using your package manager (brew/apt install yt-dlp)

warnings.message: No log level specified
warnings.guidance: Setting a log level helps with debugging. Recommended values: INFO for normal use, DEBUG for troubleshooting.

warnings.message: No processing timeout configured
warnings.guidance: Setting a processing timeout prevents stuck operations. Recommended: 30-60 minutes for most use cases.

warnings.message: No retry limit configured
warnings.guidance: Setting retry limits prevents infinite retry loops. Recommended: 3-5 retries.

warnings.message: No retry limit configured
warnings.guidance: Setting retry limits prevents infinite retry loops. Recommended: 3-5 retries.

errors.message: OpenRouter API key is required but not configured
errors.guidance: Get your API key from https://openrouter.ai/keys and add it to your .env file. OpenRouter provides access to multiple AI models with pay-per-use pricing.

errors.message: YouTube API key is required when YouTube ingestor is enabled
errors.guidance:
Get a YouTube Data API v3 key from Google Cloud Console:
1. Go to https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/library/youtube.googleapis.com
2. Enable the YouTube Data API v3
3. Create credentials (API key)
4. Add the key to your .env file
Alternatively, disable YouTube ingestor by setting YOUTUBE_INGESTOR_ENABLED=false

errors.message: Instapaper credentials are incomplete
errors.guidance: Both INSTAPAPER_LOGIN and INSTAPAPER_PASSWORD are required when Instapaper ingestor is enabled. Use your Instapaper account email and password, or disable the ingestor by setting INSTAPAPER_INGESTOR_ENABLED=false

warnings.message: 12ft.io fallback is enabled - potential privacy concern
warnings.guidance: The 12ft.io service sends URLs to a third-party service to bypass paywalls. This may expose your reading habits. Consider disabling if privacy is a concern.

warnings.message: YouTube ingestor enabled but no API key provided
warnings.guidance: YouTube ingestor requires YOUTUBE_API_KEY to function. Either provide the key or disable the ingestor.

warnings.message: Required command 'ffmpeg' not found in PATH
warnings.guidance: The ffmpeg command is required for audio/video processing. Install it using your system package manager.
warnings.fix_command: # Install ffmpeg using your package manager (brew/apt install ffmpeg)

warnings.message: Required command 'yt-dlp' not found in PATH
warnings.guidance: The yt-dlp command is required for audio/video processing. Install it using your system package manager.
warnings.fix_command: # Install yt-dlp using your package manager (brew/apt install yt-dlp)

errors.message: Data directory 'dev_output' is not writable
errors.guidance:
The application needs write access to store processed content. Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'dev_output/.write_test'
Solutions:
1. Create the directory with proper permissions: mkdir -p {data_dir} && chmod 755 {data_dir}
2. Choose a different directory by setting DATA_DIRECTORY in your .env file
3. Run with appropriate permissions if needed

warnings.message: Required command 'yt-dlp' not found in PATH
warnings.guidance: The yt-dlp command is required for audio/video processing. Install it using your system package manager.
warnings.fix_command: # Install yt-dlp using your package manager (brew/apt install yt-dlp)

warnings.message: No log level specified
warnings.guidance: Setting a log level helps with debugging. Recommended values: INFO for normal use, DEBUG for troubleshooting.

warnings.message: No processing timeout configured
warnings.guidance: Setting a processing timeout prevents stuck operations. Recommended: 30-60 minutes for most use cases.

warnings.message: No retry limit configured
warnings.guidance: Setting retry limits prevents infinite retry loops. Recommended: 3-5 retries.

errors.message: OpenRouter API key is required but not configured
errors.guidance: Get your API key from https://openrouter.ai/keys and add it to your .env file. OpenRouter provides access to multiple AI models with pay-per-use pricing.

errors.message: YouTube API key is required when YouTube ingestor is enabled
errors.guidance:
Get a YouTube Data API v3 key from Google Cloud Console:
1. Go to https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/library/youtube.googleapis.com
2. Enable the YouTube Data API v3
3. Create credentials (API key)
4. Add the key to your .env file
Alternatively, disable YouTube ingestor by setting YOUTUBE_INGESTOR_ENABLED=false

errors.message: Instapaper credentials are incomplete
errors.guidance: Both INSTAPAPER_LOGIN and INSTAPAPER_PASSWORD are required when Instapaper ingestor is enabled. Use your Instapaper account email and password, or disable the ingestor by setting INSTAPAPER_INGESTOR_ENABLED=false

warnings.message: 12ft.io fallback is enabled - potential privacy concern
warnings.guidance: The 12ft.io service sends URLs to a third-party service to bypass paywalls. This may expose your reading habits. Consider disabling if privacy is a concern.
